Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th: due to street blockage near 115th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at State/Division

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier stalled train at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier stalled train at 95th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
